members.joinCircumstances: Gyro is the founder and captain of the Gyro Pirates from South Blue.

keyMoments.title: Gyro Pirates Debut
keyMoments.description: The Gyro Pirates appear fleeing from Hody Jones after refusing to join the New Fish-Man Pirates as enslaved subordinates.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces the crew and demonstrates the threat posed by the New Fish-Man Pirates.

keyMoments.title: Gyro Pirates' Ship Destroyed
keyMoments.description: The Gyro Pirates' ship is completely destroyed by Hody Jones, with only some crew members surviving to spread word of Hody's power.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Hody's overwhelming power and establishes the New Fish-Man Pirates as a major threat.

ships.description: The Gyro Pirates' ship that was destroyed by Hody Jones in the waters near Fish-Man Island.

members.joinCircumstances: Hody Jones founded the New Fish-Man Pirates.
Zeo is one of Hody's officers, having been close to him since childhood.
Dosun is one of Hody's officers, having been close to him since childhood.
Daruma is one of Hody's officers, having been close to him since childhood.
Ikaros Much is one of Hody's officers, having been close to him since childhood.

keyMoments.title: Hody Destroys Gyro's Ship
keyMoments.description: Hody Jones demonstrates the New Fish-Man Pirates' power by destroying Gyro's ship using only his jaws while chained, enhanced by Energy Steroids.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the crew as an overwhelming threat and shows their reliance on Energy Steroids for power.

keyMoments.title: Energy Steroid Mechanics Revealed
keyMoments.description: Zeo explains that fish-men have 10 times human strength and that Energy Steroids double their power with each pill, revealing the source of the crew's enhanced abilities.
keyMoments.significance: Provides crucial information about the crew's power source and establishes the danger they pose.

keyMoments.title: New Fish-Man Pirates Advance on Fish-Man Island
keyMoments.description: Hody Jones declares his plan to kill King Neptune and orders the entire crew to advance on Fish-Man Island to begin their takeover.
keyMoments.significance: Sets the crew on a collision course with the Straw Hats and establishes the main conflict of the arc.
